sentences.en: A single tin of paint can pollute of litres of water.
sentences.cn: 一罐涂料可以污染数百万公升的水.

sentences.en: B: Are you crazy? That would pollute the water!
sentences.cn: 你疯了 吗 ?那会污染水源!
受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.en: Bicycling is a good exercise; moreover, it doesn't pollute the air.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车是很好的运动; 而且还不污染环境.

sentences.en: Bicycling is good exercise; moreover, it doesn't pollute the air.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车是一种很好的运动, 此外, 还不污染空气.

sentences.en: Cars pollute the air in the form of waste gas.
sentences.cn: 汽车以废气的形式污染空气.

sentences.en: Factories are no longer allowed to pollute the air with black smoke.
sentences.cn: 不再允许工厂的黑烟污染空气了.

sentences.en: I'm sorry, smoking will pollute air in a taxi.
sentences.cn: 对不起, 抽烟会污染车内的空气.

sentences.en: Mining would pollute the lake and denude the forest.
sentences.cn: 采矿会污染湖水，毁掉森林。

sentences.en: Our store never sells books which pollute the mind.
sentences.cn: 我们书店从不出售污染心灵的书籍.

sentences.en: Seepage from land fills can pollute ground water or surface.
sentences.cn: 填土的渗漏可能污染地下水和地面水.

sentences.en: She thinks these books pollute the minds of children.
sentences.cn: 她认为这些书腐蚀儿童的心灵.

sentences.en: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.cn: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

sentences.en: These gases pollute the atmosphere of towns and cities.
sentences.cn: 这些气体污染了城镇的空气。

sentences.en: They not only pollute the air in cities, but make them crowded.
sentences.cn: 汽车不仅污染城市空气, 而且使城市拥挤不堪.

sentences.en: Time and time again there are serious accidents that pollute the air.
sentences.cn: 空气被污染的严重事故不时地在发生.

sentences.en: Which do not pollute the air, so Earth's temperature will not increase.
sentences.cn: 哪一不污染空气, 因此地球的温度将不增加.

words.tran_cn: 污染者；污染源；污染物质
污染（pollute的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

trans.tran_cn: 弄脏， 污染； 玷污， 败坏
trans.tran_en: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use
